name: Best Buds vs Bad Guys
description: Best Buds vs Bad Guys is a 2D run ’n’ gun from a game developer Dad and his 11 year old son, with a special message behind it. Travel to 11 different worlds, all presented in classic 16-bit style, with a catchy chip-tune soundtrack and lots of over-the-top weapons!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c
